alert.note: Alert for Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 27 at 1:32AM PST until February 28 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northern Oregon Cascades and Cascades in Lane County. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades
